column10: Careful at this crosswalk as cars can come up over the hill at a high rate of speed and pedestrians/kids on bikes should pay attention, also on nearby bridge cars hug the edge of the roadway where sidewalk overgrowth forces pedestrians to road's edge.
A man was running across Guinea Rd at the trail crossing where it leads to Rutherford park and was almost hit by a car.
column21: The trail crossing does not have a signal or pedestrian beacon. The cars typically drive very fast and don't yield to pedestrians. I have seen about 10 near misses at the location in the past 3 years.
